example.text: Since his first day in office, President Biden has halted American pipeline construction, canceled domestic mining projects, and discouraged oil and gas exploration by implementing burdensome regulations. Pushing a politically-motivated agenda and unreliable energy sources, President Biden has aimed to appease climate activists and Green New Deal supporters.
Mr. Chair, I thank the Members and staff on both sides of the aisle for their hard work. This is a strong bill, and I look forward to supporting it.
Hats off to Fort Worth for being the best city in Texas to start a new business! [[url]]

I recently visited the US-Mexico border and saw the ongoing crisis firsthand. Today, I was proud to vote YES on HR 2, the Secure the Border Act with my [[user]] colleagues. The bill will secure our southern border, repair our broken immigration system, and much more. [[url]]

With China expanding its reserves and strengthening its energy ties with Russia, the United States is at risk for an energy supply disruption if a natural disaster occurs or foreign nation manipulates their prices. While we are capable of producing more than 13 million barrels of oil a day in Texas and across the United States, the Biden Administration continues to restrict domestic production and prevent true energy independence.
